A C D G S T

A

Account - Class in <Unnamed>
Account class used to model simple bank accounts, allowing money to be credited to, and debited and transfered from, an account.
Account() - Constructor for class Account
Constructor for objects of class Account.
Account(String, String, double) - Constructor for class Account
Constructor for objects of class Account which sets the values of holder, number and balance of the receiver to the arguments aHolder, aNumber and aBalance respectively.
availableToSpend() - Method in class CurrentAccount
Calculates and returns the amount available to spend; the total of the receivers's balance and creditLimit.

C

checkPin(String) - Method in class CurrentAccount
Returns true if the pinNum of the receiver matches the argument aPin, otherwise returns false.
credit(double) - Method in class Account
Credits the receiver with the value of the argument anAmount.
CurrentAccount - Class in <Unnamed>
calss CurrentAccount is a subclass of the Account class allowing the account to be overdrawn to the specified limit and is protected by PIN number.
CurrentAccount() - Constructor for class CurrentAccount
Constructor for objects of class CurrentAccount
CurrentAccount(String, String, double, double, String) - Constructor for class CurrentAccount
Constructor for objects of calss CurrentAccount, which sets the values of holder, number, balance, creditLimit and pinNum to the arguments aHolder, aNumber, aBalance, aLimit, and aPin respectively.

D

debit(double) - Method in class Account
If the balance of the receiver is equal to or greater than the argument anAmount, the balance of the receiver is debited by the argument anAmount and the method returns true.
debit(double) - Method in class CurrentAccount
If the amount availibleToSpend of the receiver is equal to or greater than the argument anAmount, the balance of the receiver is debited by the argument anAmount and the method returns true.

G

getBalance() - Method in class Account
Returns the balance of the receiver.
getCreditLimit() - Method in class CurrentAccount
Returns the credit limit of the receiver.
getHolder() - Method in class Account
Returns the holder of the receiver.
getNumber() - Method in class Account
Returns the number of the receiver.
getPinNum() - Method in class CurrentAccount
Returns the pinNum of the receiver.

S

setBalance(double) - Method in class Account
Set the balance of the receiver to the value of the argument aBalance.
setCreditLimit(double) - Method in class CurrentAccount
Sets the creditLimit of the receiver to the argument aLimit
setHolder(String) - Method in class Account
Set the holder of the receiver to the value of the argument aHolder.
setNumber(String) - Method in class Account
Set the number of the receiver to the value of the argument aNumber.
setPinNum(String) - Method in class CurrentAccount
Sets the pinNum of the receiver to the argument aPin.

T

transfer(Account, double) - Method in class Account
If the balance of the receiver is equal to or greater than the argument anAmount, the balance of the receiver is debited by the argument anAmount.
